actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Bite or Flame Ray attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Flame Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) fire. If the jackal hits a creature with Flame Ray the jackal gains half-cover vs. all attacks that originate more than 30' away from it until the start of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Daylight Skirmish
bonus_actions.desc: While in sunlight the jackal takes the Dash or Dodge action.

special_abilities.name: Day Hunter
special_abilities.desc: When the scorchrunner jackal makes an attack roll while in sunlight it can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll.
